name: @Menu & Toolbar - Compact (Icon & Font)
description: This style sheet makes menu font-size small & Toolbar's icons slim, optimized for "Personal Titlebar" add-on.
additional_info:
========== Change Log ==========
Jul 22, 2014: Updated for current Thunderbird
Jul 22, 2014: Added support for SeaMonkey
Sep 24, 2013: Added a comment to meet global styles criteria by Stylish described at https://github.com/JasonBarnabe/stylish/wiki/Preventing-global-styles
Sep 16, 2012: Updated for current Thunderbird.
Oct  5, 2011: Added support for Thuderbird.
Apr 17, 2011: Better support for "Personal Titlebar" add-on.
Apr  4, 2011: Eliminated URL bar adjustment.
Apr  4, 2011: Eliminated back & forward button padding adjustment.
Apr  4, 2011: Dropped support for Google Toolbar and Netcraft Toolbar.
Mar 28, 2011: Added "Personal Titlebar" Add-on support.
May 12, 2009: Added padding exception for back & forward buttons to make them more compact.
